metadata.feature_description: View and manage all unpublished posts including drafts and posts under review

steps.action: Navigated to News page which contains the Publisher module
steps.expected: Page loads with Publisher features visible
steps.actual: News page loaded successfully with Featured and Latest posts visible

steps.action: Clicked on Unpublished Posts button in the bottom toolbar
steps.expected: Unpublished posts panel opens showing list of draft posts
steps.actual: Unpublished panel opened displaying table with 3 unpublished posts: 'Test Post for Social Media Sharing', 'Test Post for Author Management', 'Test Blog Post for Publisher Feature'

steps.action: Examined Unpublished posts panel for filter controls
steps.expected: Filter dropdown or buttons to filter by draft/review status
steps.actual: No filter UI elements found in the Unpublished panel. Panel only shows a simple table with Name, Date Created, Author, and Actions columns

issues: Filter by status functionality is not implemented in the UI. Code review confirms UnpublishedPosts.ascx only displays a static table without filtering capabilities.

steps.action: Clicked on 'DATE CREATED' column header to attempt sorting
steps.expected: Posts should be sorted by date (ascending or descending toggle)
steps.actual: Clicking the column header had no effect. The order remained unchanged. Column headers are not interactive/clickable for sorting.

issues: Sort functionality is not implemented. Column headers are static text without click handlers. Posts are displayed in a fixed order (newest first by default based on creation date).

steps.action: Examined Unpublished posts table for bulk selection controls
steps.expected: Checkboxes in each row to select multiple posts for bulk actions
steps.actual: No checkboxes or bulk selection UI elements found. Each row only contains Name, Date Created, Author, and Actions columns with no selection capability.

issues: Bulk selection functionality is not implemented. Code review of UnpublishedPosts.ascx confirms no checkbox elements or bulk action handlers exist.

steps.action: Hovered over first unpublished post row to reveal action buttons
steps.expected: Action buttons should appear on hover
steps.actual: View Post and Edit Post icons appeared in the Actions column on hover

steps.expected: Post edit page should open for editing
steps.actual: Navigated to edit page (http://localhost:8081/en-us/News/view/edit/Test-Post-for-Social-Media-Sharing) with full post editing interface including title, content, image upload, and publishing controls

steps.action: Examined Unpublished posts panel for delete functionality
steps.expected: Delete button or option in action menu to delete draft posts
steps.actual: No delete option found. Actions column only contains View Post and Edit Post links. No delete action is available from the unpublished posts list.

issues: Delete functionality is not available from the Unpublished Posts panel. Code review confirms only View and Edit actions are implemented in UnpublishedPosts.ascx.

steps.action: Examined Unpublished posts table for workflow state information
steps.expected: Column or indicator showing workflow state (draft, pending review, etc.)
steps.actual: No workflow state column or indicator found. Table only shows Name, Date Created, Author, and Actions columns. No workflow status information is displayed.

issues: Workflow state details are not displayed in the Unpublished Posts panel. UnpublishedPostDto only contains PostId, ContentItemId, AuthorUserId, Title, and CreatedOnDate - no workflow state field.

steps.action: Examined Unpublished posts panel for export functionality
steps.expected: Export button to download unpublished posts list as CSV/Excel
steps.actual: No export button or option found anywhere in the Unpublished Posts panel. The panel only contains the close button (X) in the header and the posts table.

issues: Export functionality is not implemented. No export button or mechanism exists in the UI or code.

observations: The Unpublished Posts panel is accessed via a button in the Publisher module toolbar on pages containing the Publisher module (e.g., News page)
Code review confirms UnpublishedPosts.ascx is a simple panel with minimal functionality - only displays posts in a table with View/Edit actions
UnpublishedPostDto entity only contains basic fields: PostId, ContentItemId, AuthorUserId, Title, CreatedOnDate - no workflow state or status field
Several suggested test scenarios (filter, sort, bulk select, delete, workflow details, export) correspond to features that do not exist in the current implementation
The feature name 'Unpublished Posts Management' suggests more comprehensive management capabilities than what is actually implemented
Actions (View Post, Edit Post) only appear on hover over table rows - not immediately visible
